getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.description: The ids of the elements in the splitter. Useful for composition.

onSizeChange.description: Function called when the splitter is resized.

onSizeChangeEnd.description: Function called when the splitter resize ends.

onSizeChangeStart.description: Function called when the splitter resize starts.

orientation.description: The orientation of the splitter. Can be `horizontal` or `vertical`

size.description: The size data of the panels
